achievements.name: Apex Shortsword
achievements.description: Granted for banishing an Apex in the Rampage. Its blade is riddled with battle scars.

achievements.name: Tempestuous Triumph Scroll
achievements.description: A hanging scroll from Master Hojo, depicting your victory over Wind Serpent Ibushi.

achievements.name: Beat-up Construction Kit
achievements.description: Awarded for unlocking lots of camps. Each of its nicks and grooves tells a story.

achievements.name: Badge of Excellence
achievements.description: The mark of a peerless hunter, conferred only to those who have earned a lot of awards.

achievements.name: Kamura Amulet
achievements.description: A trinket given to new hunters who have proved themselves capable.

achievements.name: Ancestral Blade
achievements.description: A prize for vanquishing Magnamalo. This blade has led Kamura for generations.

achievements.name: Calamity Conqueror Scroll
achievements.description: Received upon defeating Ibushi and Narwa. Depicts the two serpents leading the Rampage.

achievements.name: Fan of Fading Crimson
achievements.description: A decorative fan awarded to those who vanquished the crimson-glowing threat to the village.

achievements.name: Fan of Ascendancy
achievements.description: The mark of a hunter who has attempted some of the toughest quests around—and won.

achievements.name: Fan of True Ascendancy
achievements.description: Mark of a hunter who has bested Infernal Springs' most arduous challenges.

achievements.name: Aspiring Hunter Certificate
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many low rank quests.

achievements.name: Adept Hunter Certificate
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many high rank quests.

achievements.name: Rampage Nemesis Certificate
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Rampage quests.

achievements.name: Arena Fighter Certificate
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Arena quests.

achievements.name: Spiritwood Necklace
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Shrine Ruins. Made from Spiritwood branches.

achievements.name: Frozen Lampsquid Earring
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Frost Islands. A relic encased in primeval ice.

achievements.name: Prismatic Chalice
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Flooded Forest. Was found buried under rubble.

achievements.name: Silver Cactus Ring
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Sandy Plains. A peculiar silver cactus ring.

achievements.name: Heliotrope Bracelet
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Lava Caverns. Glitters a red-blue mélange.

achievements.name: Wreath of Honor
achievements.description: A wreath received from the villagers as thanks for taking on their many requests.

achievements.name: Kamura Pinwheel
achievements.description: Awarded for performing 1000 Wiredashes. Spins smoothly in the wind.

achievements.name: Shabby Canyne Saddle
achievements.description: Awarded for riding Canynes many times. Worn in odd places from use on countless voyages.

achievements.name: Great Wirebug Plate
achievements.description: Awarded for discovering many Great Wirebug launch points. Sports a nice relevant design.

achievements.name: Hunting Helpers Plate
achievements.description: Awarded for gathering 500 Hunting Helpers. Features a beautiful depiction of them.

achievements.name: Golden Spiribug Plate
achievements.description: Awarded for gathering 1000 Golden and Gilded Spiribugs. Shines much like they do.

achievements.name: Antique Bookmark
achievements.description: Awarded for finding many Old Messages. Adorned with a tasteful pattern.

achievements.name: Deft-hand Rod
achievements.description: Awarded for catching many fish. Feels familiar in your hands. One cast, one catch!

achievements.name: Well-done Grillmeister
achievements.description: Awarded for cooking a welldone steak 30 times. Good job, and well done!

achievements.name: Copper Ecologist's Award
achievements.description: Awarded for photographing many Hunting Helpers. Proof you've expanded your hunter horizons.

achievements.name: Silver Ecologist's Award
achievements.description: Awarded by one enthusiastic researcher for photographing many Rare Creature.

achievements.name: Gold Ecologist's Award
achievements.description: Awarded for photographing many Endemic Lifeforms. Now you're a Guild-recognized researcher!

achievements.name: Extravagant Cashbox
achievements.description: Awarded for earning 1,000,000 zenny. Heavy with impressively intricate goldwork.

achievements.name: Well-worn Cashbox
achievements.description: Awarded for accumulating 100,000 Kamura Points. Gleams with polish despite great use.

achievements.name: Thank-mew Letter
achievements.description: Awarded for hiring 50 Buddies. We a-purr-eciate your fur-iendly patronage!

achievements.name: Good Luck Charm
achievements.description: Proof of having sent the Meowcenaries out on a quest 100 times.

achievements.name: From Palicoes, with Love
achievements.description: Awarded for raising various support-type Palicoes to their maximum levels.

achievements.name: Palamute Gear Tune-up Kit
achievements.description: Awarded for collecting a lot of Palamute Gear. Daily maintenance is what will make it last!

achievements.name: Luxury Armor Stand
achievements.description: Awarded for forging many valuable weapons and armor. Made from premium materials.

achievements.name: Colorful Armor Stand
achievements.description: Awarded for forging many a layered armor. Its variegated hues are simply captivating.

achievements.name: Petalace Arrangement Vase
achievements.description: Awarded for obtaining many Petalaces. It fills rooms with a delightful floral aroma.

achievements.name: Master's Black Belt
achievements.description: Awarded for obtaining many Switch Skills, a feat of both mental and bodily discipline.

achievements.name: Chef's Trusty Tools
achievements.description: Awarded for helping Yomogi. You can almost hear the Tea Dealers' chanting when looking at it.

achievements.name: Sturdy Padlock
achievements.description: Awarded for collecting many decorations and hanging scrolls. Remember to lock up!

achievements.name: Cohoots' Dresser
achievements.description: Awarded to connoisseurs of Cohoot outfits. Perfect for storing your avian apparel.

achievements.name: Runner's Sandals
achievements.description: Awarded for talking to many of Kamura's citizens. Feels like walking on a carpet of cloud.

achievements.name: Dreadnought Destroyer Plaque
achievements.description: Awarded for hunting 1,000 large monsters.

achievements.name: Five-in-One Plaque
achievements.description: Awarded for hunting 5 monsters in 1 Expedition Tour.

achievements.name: Seasoned Jockey Plaque
achievements.description: Awarded for riding many different monsters.

achievements.name: Mini Crown Plaque
achievements.description: Awarded for registering many miniature crownsized monsters.

achievements.name: Gold Crown Plaque
achievements.description: Awarded for registering many gold crown-sized monsters.

achievements.name: Royal Request for Cooperation
achievements.description: An official request for Kamura's hunter. Awarded for collaboration with Elgado Outpost.

achievements.name: Long-Distance Binoculars
achievements.description: Binoculars giving a clear view of far-off targets. Awarded to staunch investigators.

achievements.name: Survey Cape
achievements.description: Protects the wearer from the harshest environments. Awarded for hunting the Garangolm.

achievements.name: Azure Feather Fountain Pen
achievements.description: A fountain pen with a blue feather gifted by Fiorayne. Awarded for hunting the Lunagaron.

achievements.name: Majestic Desk Banner
achievements.description: A desk flag proving the owner's distinguished service. Awarded for slaying Malzeno.

achievements.name: Royal Declaration of Gratitude
achievements.description: An official thank-you letter. For hunters who contributed greatly to the Kingdom's peace.

achievements.name: Record of Utmost Valor - Master
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing many Master Rank quests.

achievements.name: Snowy Cohoot Mini-Pouch
achievements.description: Awarded for befriending a fledgling Snowy Cohoot from Elgado. Looks tiny, but has a big appetite.

achievements.name: Record of Utmost Valor - Arena
achievements.description: A souvenir from the Guild for completing even more Arena quests.

achievements.name: Painting - Foreign Threads
achievements.description: Awarded for completing many Follower Quests to mark deep village-Outpost ties.

achievements.name: Painting - Seicho's Place
achievements.description: Proof of having completed many Support Surveys. Soar away into a clear blue sky.

achievements.name: Cups of Friendship
achievements.description: Awarded for deepening bonds with many Followers. Sharing this cup fosters friendship.

achievements.name: Painting - Crimson Nightmare
achievements.description: A depiction of the dreadful Qurio. Awarded for completing numerous Anomaly Quests.

achievements.name: Sea-Blue Amulet
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Jungle. A talisman to protect you on your travels.

achievements.name: Copal Brooch
achievements.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Citadel. A charm praying for your good health.

achievements.name: Beloved Bouquet
achievements.description: Awarded for fulfilling various requests in Kamura and/or Elgado.

achievements.name: Familiar Construction Kit
achievements.description: An easy-to-deploy camping kit. Awarded for unlocking a lot of camps in the Jungle and Citadel.

achievements.name: Great Wirebug Medal
achievements.description: Awarded for discovering a lot of Great Wirebug launch points in the Jungle and the Citadel.

achievements.name: Immaculate Bookmark
achievements.description: Awarded for discovering a lot of Old Messages in the Jungle and Citadel. An unspoiled antique.

achievements.name: Natural Picture Frame
achievements.description: A smart frame awarded for photographing many creatures in the Citadel and Jungle.

achievements.name: Transcender's Red Sash
achievements.description: Its refinement exceeds human capability. Awarded for obtaining even more Switch Skills.

achievements.name: Great Helmet
achievements.description: A pretty great winged helmet. Awarded for forging even more valuable weapons and armor.

achievements.name: Gorgeous Helm
achievements.description: A helm with golden hollows and blue wings. Awarded for forging even more valuable layered armor.

achievements.name: Solid Padlock
achievements.description: Awarded for collecting even more trinkets and wall hangings. Won't budge, no matter what.

achievements.name: Maestro's Trusty Tools
achievements.description: Super popular in the Tea Shop! Awarded for helping make new dango, even in far-off Elgado.

achievements.name: Secret Honey Jar
achievements.description: Awarded to dango connoisseurs for using many Hopping Skewers. Add honey to sweeten things up!

achievements.name: Napping Felyne & Canyne
achievements.description: Toys of a cuddling Felyne and Canyne. Awarded to avid instructors at the Buddy Dojo.

achievements.name: Sojourn Necklace
achievements.description: A necklace that ended up with your Buddy. Awarded for trading with Letters of Introduction.

achievements.name: Buddy Whistle
achievements.description: A simple flute with far-reaching tones. Awarded to those who have found a lot of Recon destinations.

achievements.name: Flaky Canyne Pie
achievements.description: A tasty treat for hard-working Canynes. Awarded for teaching your Canyne lots of techniques.

achievements.name: Polychrome Acorn
achievements.description: A cute and colorful painted acorn. Awarded for having lots of Buddies with outstanding Skill Memory.

achievements.name: Windbreaker Scarf
achievements.description: Ignore wind as you whip through the world. Awarded for performing many Switch Skill Swaps.

achievements.name: Jewelgrass Planter
achievements.description: Awarded to those who rode various monsters with the power of Morphed Wirebugs.

achievements.name: Unbreakable Bag
achievements.description: Wow! A whole bag awarded for obtaining samples of items from all over the place.

achievements.name: Comfortable Sandals
achievements.description: Sandals for exploring. Awarded for talking with lots of people in the Outpost.

achievements.name: Hunter's Bronze Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for hunting 100 large master rank monsters.

achievements.name: Hunter's Silver Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for hunting 500 large master rank monsters.

achievements.name: Hunter's Gold Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for hunting 1000 large master rank monsters.

achievements.name: Miniature Crown Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for registering almost all miniature crown-sized monsters.

achievements.name: Gold Crown Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for registering almost all gold crown-sized monsters.

achievements.name: Anomaly Hunt Silver Trophy
achievements.description: Awarded for slaying your first afflicted monster.

achievements.name: Anomaly Hunt Gold Trophy
achievements.description: Awarded for slaying 100 afflicted monsters.

achievements.name: Anomaly Research Report
achievements.description: An extremely detailed report, the result of impressive hard work researching the Anomaly.

achievements.name: Vermilion Amber Essence
achievements.description: Awarded only to those who have completed tasks designated by the Research Lab to be the most difficult.

achievements.name: Bahari's Hand-Wound Birdie
achievements.description: Bahari's handmade toy that walks when wound up. Proves you frequent the Anomaly Lab.

achievements.name: Smithy's Custom-made Gloves
achievements.description: Awarded for Augmenting many weapons via Qurious Crafting. Specially developed to handle dangerous afflicted materials.

achievements.name: Smithy's Tools of the Trade
achievements.description: Awarded for Augmenting a lot of armor via Qurious Crafting. These tools can work even the most brittle of materials.

achievements.name: Surmounter’s Slaying Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for slaying your first Risen monster.

achievements.name: Shining Surmounter’s Shield
achievements.description: Awarded for slaying 15 Risen monsters.

achievements.name: Hero's Accolade
achievements.description: The mark of a great hero, who has acquired a large number of awards.
